articles.author: Kevin Purdy, Ars Technica
articles.title: USB-C Is Now the Law of the Land in Europe - WIRED
articles.description: Apple has already pulled devices to comply with the European Commission’s new Common Charger Directive.
articles.content: "It's time for THE charger," the European Commission posted to X on December 28, 2024. While the sentiment applies only to one continent (and not all of it) and only certain devices, the Common Charg… [+3738 chars]
